section.title: Output Types
section.para: Valid output types (or debug modes) are as follows:

row.entry: Enable output of all types listed in this table
Print out entrances and exits to most subroutines to enable quick tracing of crash locations
Trace execution of commands in command lists (e.g. filters) and print information on variable access paths
Debug OpenGL calls and graphics capabilities as best as is possible
Debug file-reading and argument parsing routines
Print (lots of) information regarding setting and matching of atom type descriptions
Enable a little extra output (but not much)

listitem.para: System Commands for methods to set various system values
